content.label: Very good game would recommend

title.label: Great game but way more potential for the company

content.label: I love the game but the potential in the company it would be cool to make this for like soccer or American football or like basket ball and in division one you could add NASCAR
Why create a scheme to not see it during the race?

title.label: MM2 is a classic. MM3 improved everything

content.label: I do not care about racing. I don’t know how a car works. I didn’t even know teenagers could be professional drivers. But the simulation and management aspects in this game are second to none. Every decision matters, the in game choices make or break races so you feel like you’re “playing,” each race rather than hit sim and get a result output. MM3 improved GFX, added more options and drivers, and seems to be just as replay-able. When I truck and have no reception in areas quality offline games like these are amazing
It has everything I would want in a manager game. They should continue on this and make other sports versions of this game. I would love a basketball version.

This is by far the most fun I’ve had on an app in a long time! It absolutely worth the price, and I don’t even feel bad paying for extra stuff because I want to support the development team. They have done a wonderful job with this game with all of the things you get to control, and I have put a ton of time into this game already. Thank you to the developers for releasing this game!

I LOVE this game. First day i got it i played until my phone was at 10%. I really enjoy making my own calls and it is just so much fun. A few things i would like to be added in MM4, if there is one, is longer races with longer tyre life. i feel like the tyre wear for the lengths of the races is really good, but with the longer races i feel like strategy can be further enhanced, when i say longer races i mean maybe 45-50% races of what it really is and i am using the f1 series and gt series saying this. Number 2 and the most important to me would be NASCAR. Now I know that this is a mostly European racing game but i would LOVE TO SEE NASCAR in this because if you love making calls and good strategy then NASCAR would be a great addition. The tyres don’t last as long, you make 3-4 pit stops. Pit as late as possible or pit before everyone and then when the pit stops cycle out then maybe you will be in the lead, as you can see so many strategies to choose. Other than that great job devs and keep it up.
When will there be updates to this game? Better than 1 and 2. Instead of updating 1 , 3 needs new updates
The only reason I would pick Motorsport manager online over this is the fact that you can’t actually see the cars in game here.
Lots of fun
I actually hope the developer reads this, this game is amazing but there’s one thing. Can we name the car, Please that’s be so dope if we could. Other than that great job 😬👉🏾👈🏾❤️
Fantastic game there isn’t one better made for a gamer, also if your a f1 fan definitely recommend it.

Hi, this game is extremely fun  and great for a Motorsports fan like me to have some fun.  There a few bugs here and there, but not that many really.  One thing I’d like to see in the future is a stock car racing option.  I know the game kind of leads towards European racing, but it’d be cool to see stock car racing in the game (especially since i am a very big fan of stock car races)

Overall, i love the game.  It has so many fun aspects and multiple different strategies for races.  Another aspect to the game I’d like to see would be a rival system between the different drivers in the field.  

If u are a motorsport fan and are looking for a great game, I’d definitely recommend this one!

This game is almost incredibly awesome expect one thing:Retirement. Ex: Genki Kawashima, he’s only 32 years old! Yet he wants to retire on my 1st season.That guy was a star driver. I had enough influence to recruit him but he was going to retire. That’s a bummer that I hate. Can you dev change that pls? (IF NOT THEN I WILL FIND YOU AND KILL YOU!) (Just kidding 😉 but pls do that retirement problem).
Great game just lacks depth.

title.label: The best so far, but still needs some work

content.label: I’ve played every single version of this game including PC and I still love it, definitely one of my favorite mobile games of all time. Though, like every other version, the game still isn’t balanced that well. You always start off a series losing every race and in a couple seasons you dominate everyone and are almost unbeatable. Then you move up to the next series and do it all over again. I’ve gotten to the point of having to basically throw races to make the championship more interesting because I really don’t feel like restarting the entire game again just for more excitement. I mean the game doesn’t get boring it’s just too easy in the long-run. Something, in this game or future games, needs to be done to the AI so they can compete with you even when you’re technologically the best on the grid.

First, my compliments to the developers for making an outstanding mobile game that doesn’t require payment to enjoy and doesn’t overwhelm the user with ads. However, to progress through the last couple of race tiers, you’re going to be going through a huge slog unless you shell out huge amounts of cash. The game reels you in by not asking you for a lot of money, only to require it later on in order to be remotely competitive. If you’re fine with this model, by all means try the game.
I like the raw gaming from Motorsports Manager 1 better

Really fun, the only issues I have are that it’s pretty easy to become basically Mercedes in 5ish seasons if not fewer and win everything. This wouldn’t be a huge issue if there was much variety across the different cars but there’s not so it becomes kinda stale after awhile since you know what’s going to happen almost every race. It’s enjoyable to play and worth it though.
This Game is really cool. I love playing it although it does get a little boring sometimes.
A game that I can enjoy and won’t rip you off with in app purchases

I’ve played both MM2 and now MM3 and this latest version brings more to the table. It is also a more polished game than MM2. Other reviewers have complained about certain choices that were made, some of which I don’t have a problem with - but, the Devs do need to go back and work on the art for all the people in the game. They look like plastic department store models and the hair styling is really terrible.

If you have not played any of this series, MM2 or MM3 will be fun for you. Bundle price that I paid was great.
I love this game but I had an idea you take this game and make motocross manager it’s the same concept but with higher chances of crashing and less consistent.

title.label: Good game but haven't been able to play

content.label: The game crashes Everytime I press play. It's extremely irritating especially when I've bought everything for the game.

This is easily the best race manager game on mobile, this game is well worth the price to unlock the premium features. My only complaints would be a more engrossing livery and sponsorship system is needed, but there are no other mobile race manager games that come close to this in gameplay and user interface. You may get improved graphics with the officially licensed F1 game, but this gameplay is far better. Great work guys, keep improving!

All 3 of these games are amazing. Love the invitationals, love the mechanics, love the supplier network. I would REALLY love to be able to see the cars instead of just dots and i would love the set ups to come back instead of these “setup cards” that are kind of just luck. Other than that the game is amazing can’t wait for the next one.

So the game itself is fantastic but if you buy the driver editor and chairmen’s payment it costs you some money. And if you accidentally delete the game and redownload it you have to buy them again, and I’m you also have to do that if you start a new game. I did that and I stopped playing the game. Please make it so it won’t do that.

title.label: Amazing but this is my opinion

content.label:
This game is amazing. Doing contracts with sponsors and drivers and many more other things are incredible things that this game has. When I started in the f1 series, it was great. I had ok drivers, cars and staff. It was until the end of the season that I went to prototypes. When I started another season, a new thing was introduced and it was called “energy” or something like that. I know that in real life, f1 uses DRS which makes the car faster on straights. I don’t really like this new energy concept, it makes the racing complex and it’s another thing you have to worry about. I feel like that should be removed. Other than that the game is great!! I will check ou MM2 and MM1.

P.s  it will be cool if we can see the cars on the track instead of dots. Just something that will make the experience better!

It’s a good game to play for a while I enjoyed it a lot, but this a now boring and it’s ok for its price. Now this game is just boring after u reach tier 3 there is nothing to do in it all you could do is do the same thing that you have done in the past tiers.
The game is so cool，pls add more language.
I could play MM3 hours on end but i wanna see a more immersive expiry with MM4 or future updates, this game is amazing but gets 4 stars for its simplistic feel.
Game is amazing when it works which currently it won’t save so it’s no point in playing cause I have to keep redoing the sane races if I’ve stepped away for a few hours or longer

It would have been great to see this:
Series 4: Menards Arca Series
Series 3: Gander Outdoor Truck Series
Series 2: Xfinity Series
Series 1: Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series
It would have been great to have NASCAR in this game as well! 
Next MM game put NASCAR in it and more NASCAR fans will come in and play.

I’ve been playing this game for a long time and was just wondering when it will be fully functional on the iPhone 11....... I can play the game with almost no issues but when it’s time to upgrade my car I cannot see the bottom of the screen for t buy parts or build parts feature, I never had this issue with any other iPhone I’ve had.. help me out here

title.label: One of the best games ever

content.label:
Really fun but sometimes confusing but still it’s a really good running game with stunning graphics
🤯🤯🤯🤯

I think practice sessions need to he added to the game. More real setups and much harder car development. It’s really easy to dominate and when the regulation change, you’re still first. There needs a lot of work to make this game like a pc version. Hopefully there will be a MMM4 because it will keep us addicted to the game, not bored.

The team name in the Teams' Championship (Live) grid during races doesn't update properly. It continues to show the first name of my team and won't update, although I haven't had this happen anywhere else
Dipende da dove siete nati. Comunque il giococ è bellino, soprattutto quando Batman si toglie il costume e si scopre che in realtá è Gigi Finizio/D’Alessio. Ciao e grazie per il pancakes

I would always feel excited waiting in my bed at 11 at night waiting for the next manager mobile game to come out but it didn’t come out this year, when will the next game come out? 

Love this game 5 stars

title.label: Good game but ultimately very repetitive.

content.label:
It’s nice, but ultimately repetitive. There are many goals to pursue but no real skill or intelligence is required to achieve any of them. You’re just going through the motions again and again and again. Maybe it is different on higher difficulties but I’ve found the game quite boring after a point. The same is true with the last game in the series in which I’ve invested at least 20 hours. 

Now don’t get me wrong. It’s fun and polished but it became a button pressing simulator. Press this and then press that and repeat five times. At least the last one was unforgiving, it was very easy to lose. In this one, I’d get into debt and not care, because seasons are five races and you have four races to make up your balance. So you end up always on the plus. 

So after two seasons I’ve deleted it. Maybe I don’t have the patience to play these games anymore.

Honestly i feel yall took a step back with this game when you took out the custom setup for qualifying, that made the game more interesting and i felt like i was more in control. Now its like the game decides where i start and i dont really like that. Fix that and ill play again

title.label: A bit of a downgrade over MM2

content.label: No aerodynamics or qualifying decisions.  Still good, but less so than #2
What are these guys thinking? An augmented reality feature without actual rendered vehicles. That alone takes so much from the experience.

The game is awesome, no doubt. Strategy is great, track overlay is accurate, and the game is, overall, 10/10. What I cannot stand is the period of updating! Too little updates, less new things. Not cool. Would give 6 stars, but, for now, needs necessary random updates. Not asking for a specific update, but needs fixes. Thanks!
What in the world, why would you take the one of the best aspects of the game away and replace them with those cards. Really a step back.
Very fun, I don’t always have time to boot up my computer and open the game to play for 45 mins. The races go by very fast while also running very smooth. I will be stuck on this for a long time.
This is a must have game!
Spent so many time on this game...

title.label: Best mobile game I’ve played in a while.

content.label: The game starts off throwing a lot of information at you but once you understand  it the game because insanely fun and wildly addicting. Sure to excite racing fans and tycoon lovers all with no need for micro-transactions.
A free game on the app market that doesn’t need real money for you to win? I can totally get behind this game; a real gem that is quite addictive.
